DOC.brief_summary: Ulinastatin reduce amount bleed fibrinolysis high risk patient undergo off-pump coronary bypass surgery ( OPCAB ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Ulinastatin Coagulation High Risk Patients Undergoing Off Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery
DOC.criteria: Eighty high risk patient undergo OPCAB ( High risk patient : Euro score ≥ 6 , acute coronary syndrome , preoperative CKMB increase 5 time normal value high sensitivity CRP ≥2.0 ) The patient receive additional operation , patient n't agree participate trial , patient past hypersensitive experience Ulinastatin
